required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study of LY011 in the Treatment of Advanced Pancreatic Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Study of CLDN18.2 Chimeric Antigen Receptor T Cells in the Treatment of Advanced Pancreatic Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: CLDN 18.2 chimeric antigen receptor T cells Clinical research plan for the treatment of recurrent or refractory pancreatic cancer.

primary_outcome.description: the proportion of patients with best overall response of complete response (CR) or partial response (PR), as per local investigator´s assessment and according to Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST) version 1.1 criteria

secondary_outcome.description: Survival witouth observed progression at 2 years

DOR was defined as the time from the first documented a Complete Response (CR: Disappearance of all target lesions) or a Partial Response (PR: ≥30% decrease in the sum of diameters of target lesions) to progressive disease (PD was defined as ≥20% increase in the sum of diameters of target lesions. In addition to the relative increase of 20%, the sum must also have demonstrated an absolute increase of ≥5 mm.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events [Safety and Tolerability]

facility.name: The Affiliated Hospital of Xuzhou Medical University
